page.title: 18WORTHEN EMPLOYMENT CONTINUED
page.content: self employed and similar. There are quite a large number of retired people in the community, some locals, and some who have moved into the area upon retirement. The rector lives in the New Rectory, while the old rectory is occupied by a Shrewsbury solicitor. None of the teachers in the school live in the immediate neighbourhood. A number of people are employed in shops, offices, and factories in Shrewsbury: a few commute further afield to Telford and to towns in the West Midlands. There are now quite a number unemployed, and some wives work part time as home helps.
